title: Apron
description: heavily embroidered center panel, 12\" wide x 19-1/2\" long; flora and fauna, heavy chrysanthemum in pink and green on black, blue and red; black borders, 6-1/2\" on sides of panel; top 2-1/2\" band was once attached to ties; printed fabric lines center panel; fringe of red and green on center panel
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
